Description:
Detects external IP address lookups by non-browser processes via services such as "api.ipify.org". This could be indicative of potential post compromise internet test activity.

Author: Janantha Marasinghe, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Network Connection to IP Lookup Service APIs
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" ((dst_host="www.ip.cn" OR dst_host="l2.io") (dst_host="*api.2ip.ua*" OR dst_host="*api.bigdatacloud.net*" OR dst_host="*api.ipify.org*" OR dst_host="*bot.whatismyipaddress.com*" OR dst_host="*canireachthe.net*" OR dst_host="*checkip.amazonaws.com*" OR dst_host="*checkip.dyndns.org*" OR dst_host="*curlmyip.com*" OR dst_host="*db-ip.com*" OR dst_host="*edns.ip-api.com*" OR dst_host="*eth0.me*" OR dst_host="*freegeoip.app*" OR dst_host="*geoipy.com*" OR dst_host="*getip.pro*" OR dst_host="*icanhazip.com*" OR dst_host="*ident.me*" OR dst_host="*ifconfig.io*" OR dst_host="*ifconfig.me*" OR dst_host="*ip-api.com*" OR dst_host="*ip.360.cn*" OR dst_host="*ip.anysrc.net*" OR dst_host="*ip.taobao.com*" OR dst_host="*ip.tyk.nu*" OR dst_host="*ipaddressworld.com*" OR dst_host="*ipapi.co*" OR dst_host="*ipconfig.io*" OR dst_host="*ipecho.net*" OR dst_host="*ipinfo.io*" OR dst_host="*ipip.net*" OR dst_host="*ipof.in*" OR dst_host="*ipv4.icanhazip.com*" OR dst_host="*ipv4bot.whatismyipaddress.com*" OR dst_host="*ipv6-test.com*" OR dst_host="*ipwho.is*" OR dst_host="*jsonip.com*" OR dst_host="*myexternalip.com*" OR dst_host="*seeip.org*" OR dst_host="*wgetip.com*" OR dst_host="*whatismyip.akamai.com*" OR dst_host="*whois.pconline.com.cn*" OR dst_host="*wtfismyip.com*")) NOT (process_path="*\\opera.exe" OR process_path="*\\seamonkey.exe" OR process_path="*\\brave.exe" OR (process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Google\\Chrome\\Application\\chrome.exe" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Google\\Chrome\\Application\\chrome.exe") OR (process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Mozilla Firefox\\firefox.exe" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Mozilla Firefox\\firefox.exe") OR (process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Internet Explorer\\iexplore.exe" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Internet Explorer\\iexplore.exe") OR process_path="*\\maxthon.exe" OR process_path="*\\whale.exe" OR (process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft\\EdgeWebView\\Application\\*" process_path="*\\WindowsApps\\MicrosoftEdge.exe" (process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft\\Edge\\Application\\msedge.exe" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft\\Edge\\Application\\msedge.exe")) OR ((process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft\\EdgeCore\\*" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft\\EdgeCore\\*") (process_path="*\\msedge.exe" OR process_path="*\\msedgewebview2.exe")) OR process_path="*\\safari.exe" OR process_path="*\\vivaldi.exe")
